text.div:
Revenue Center NDC Quantity Qualifier Code

Effective with Version 'J', the code used to indicate the unit of measurement for the drug that was administered. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/revcntrndcqtyqlfr_cd

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/rev-cntr-ndc-qty-qlfr-cd defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
F2 International UnitInternational Unit
GR GramGram
ML MilliliterMilliliter
UN UnitUnit

name: Revenue Center NDC Quantity Qualifier Code
title: Revenue Center NDC Quantity Qualifier Code
description: Effective with Version 'J', the code used to indicate the unit of measurement for the drug that was administered. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/rev_cntr_ndc_qty_qlfr_cd
